title: Desmond Morris - 2004 - The Nature of Happiness (176) [Inua].pdf
description:
The Nature of Happiness
by Desmond Morris

What is happiness? Here, one of the worldÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s foremost behavioral scientists tackles this age-old question. He shows that there are many ways of achieving happiness; for example, there is the inherent happiness that comes with the love of a child; the competitive happiness of triumphing over your opponents; the sensual happiness of the hedonist. Rather than preaching a particular behavior or way of life, Morris provides knowledge that we can use, if we wish, to make ourselves happier.
